SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

de.upb.m2m.quality.languages
Class AbstractLanguageConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  de.upb.m2m.quality.languages.AbstractLanguageConfiguration

public abstract class AbstractLanguageConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract class specifying all language-specific configurations needed for measuring M2M quality metrics. It handles the location of involved metamodels and models, names of languages, lines of code measurements, and transformations between language AST representations and metric models.

This class can be extended via language-specific plug-ins. For this, this plug-in provides the "Language" extension point (with ID "de.upb.m2m.quality.languages"). Language-specific plug-ins just have to provide implementations for the abstract methods within this class.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Sebastian Lehrig (lehrig@mail.upb.de)

getName

public abstract java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of the provided M2M language.

Example: "QVT-R".

Returns:
M2M language name

getUiAttributeFileText

public abstract java.lang.String getUiAttributeFileText()
Returns the language-specific name of the UI element asking for the input transformation script.

Example: "qvtrFile".

Returns:
The UI element name

getExtensions

public abstract java.lang.String[] getExtensions()
Returns the language-specific extension names of the UI element filtering for the given extensions when selecting an input transformation script.

Example: {"*.qvt"}.

Returns:
An array of possible language extension names

getLanguageMetaModels

public abstract java.lang.String[] getLanguageMetaModels()
Returns the language-specific set of metamodels modeling the language.

Example: {"/metamodel/SemanticsQvt.ecore", "/metamodel/SemanticsOcl.ecore"}

Returns:
An array of required metamodels for modeling the language

getLanguageMetricsMetaModels

public abstract java.lang.String[] getLanguageMetricsMetaModels()
Returns the (not necessary langua-specific) set of quality metric metamodels to which the language-specific AST will be mapped.

Example: {"/metamodel/QVTMetrics.ecore"}.

Returns:
An array of required quality metric metamodels

getLanguageToMetricsTransformations

public abstract java.lang.String[] getLanguageToMetricsTransformations()
Returns language-specific paths to the transformation scripts that map from a languages' AST model to the quality metrics model.

Note: Currently, only exactly _one_ transformation script is supported.

Example: {"/scripts/metrics.qvt"}.

Returns:
An array of transformation scripts

public abstract de.upb.m2m.quality.parser.ILanguageParser getParser()
Provides a language-specific parser.

Returns:
The language-specific parser

public abstract AbstractLanguageConfiguration.SUPPORTED_TRANSFORMATION_JOBS getTransformationJobType()
The type of transformation job which transforms from language to metrics model.

Example: SUPPORTED_TRANSFORMATION_JOBS.QVTR

Returns:
The type of the transformation job
